alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Holt (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 2:13AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Doniphan, southeastern Holt and west central Andrew Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 212 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Highland, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Highland, Troy, Oregon, Forest City, Fillmore, White Cloud, Leona, Iowa Point, Fanning and Iowa Reservation of Kansas and Nebraska. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 64 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
